entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't DllImport System.Native libraries #26919

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix StatInterop to include new signature #26916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.401 #26905
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Avoid parallel workload MSI extraction #26862
    Servicing-consider
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC1 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
